'''Court of Justice's Booming Commerce''' is an outdoor gift set favored by the companions: [[Lynette]], [[Lyney]], and [[Chiori]].

The blueprint is obtainable from the [[Realm Depot]] for {{Item|Realm Currency|24|x=240}}.
